title: Are Tomatoes a Fruit or Vegetable?
description:
Developed from the ovary in the base of a flower containing the seeds of the plant. Must we adhere to this outdated and close-minded label, or can our food finally enjoy a more fluid identity? Today we ask: Are Tomatoes a Fruit or Vegetable?
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
